overview: A young sexy girl is aspiring to become an author. As she writes the chapters of her story she lives them through her imagination. Suddenly the phone rings up. A voice tells her that unless she comes up with $200,000 she will never see her brother again. She decides to go and play her savings in a casino and win the money. As she sits at the roulette table the imagination introduces her to a world of shiny leather and latex clothes where everybody is having sex. When she leaves the casino a gang of motorcycle riders kidnap her and take her to a warehouse where she has unlimited sex with all the members of the gang. She finds out that the boss of the gang, Don Alvarez, is the one that kidnapped her brother. He sits in front of a chess board and again her fantasy makes all the chessmen turn alive and she becomes the White Queen dominating the chess board in a hot sex frenzy.
title: Dominatrix Chess Gambit
